resources.string: You couldn\'t even start thinking that it\'s just another ugly statue. It\'s not just red glowing eyes, but the fact that nobody would just equip it with actual _%s_ like that.
Much like soldier the spider guards are sworn to protect their kingdom. The guard\'s venom is used to immobilize their targets causing paralysis.

Amber spiders are the mysterious and rare creatures that poses psychic powers similar to a psi-spiders, but are much tougher than their regular brethren. Name "amber" refers to the color of their giant brain-sacks, that being revealed before their victims, as Amber Spiders strikes with their powers.
Are you sure, you want to delete this save state?
